channel.title: “Sun Showers” (Prod WAVZ) | Dance / Funk
channel.description:
Might fix up this track to make it on my new EP coming soon but so far it didn’t make the cut. Let me know what you think of it!

item.title: “Sun Showers” (Prod WAVZ) | Dance / Funk
item.dc:creator: WAVZ
item.description:
The bass is Gravel, lower the lowpass, bring the shape all the way up and take the tone all the way down. It’s the most realistic natural bass I can find so far- and I have a real bass which I make my initial grooves on… gives it a realistic vibe haha! Appreciate the comment man means a lot- got more of these tracks dropping soon- as well as a track that’s already out (it’s called RoadTrip)!

Read full topic

item.title: “Sun Showers” (Prod WAVZ) | Dance / Funk
item.dc:creator: Db909
item.description:
You should definitely fix this up, it does need some fixin, but there’s great stuff to work with. I really like the Rain melody but it’s begging to have a big emotional chorus along with it. The bass sounded SUPER GOOD which instrument was that?
